description: Timeless look and incredibly hardwearing – Fjällräven's new Vardag Jacket is here for the long term. The design is simple and robust with large patch pockets and durable metal buttons. It’s made from their hardiest G-1000 HeavyDuty Eco fabric that ages beautifully and softens over time. A versatile base garment that is just as suitable for everyday use as for easy-going outdoor life and travelling.
name: Fjallraven Vardag Jacket - Mens
